website_summaries.verdict: Many campers want to leave the smallest carbon footprint possible, and this eco-friendly camp stove fits the bill, though performance is variable.
pros: Uses natural materials (twigs, branches) as fuel
Converts heat into electrical power for cellphones and other electronics
cons: Pricey compared to similar wood-burning stoves

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for hikers or anyone who wants hassle-free cooking
customer_reviews.text: I've had both the BioLite stoves -- the first and second versions -- and they are just too much of a hassle. It takes a lot of work and babysitting to keep the flame going, and in colder weather I could not get the battery to charge. I had a blazing fire going for over an hour and the meter just stayed where it was -- low to no charge. Then you can get into these weird scenarios in which the flames die down, and you are trying to get it going, but the fan turns off. Just very busy and fickle. I'm going back to the tried and true gas stoves.
customer_reviews.author: Graham R Tillotson

customer_reviews.title: Un-freaking-believable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond cool and nifty, this thing ROCKS! Easy to use, set up, gather fuel for, cook on... does exactly what you want it to do. Used it at 11k feet for 3 days for 2 meals a day with no issues whatsoever. The blower really helps get things moving when at altitude, too. Size is manageable when transporting; weight isn't too bad, especially considering you don't have to lug fuel around everywhere you go. Keep in mind, it is a little top-heavy, so be sure you're on a level surface. Also, don't be in a rush to charge your device as it takes a little while to charge things up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Everything it claims to be.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely extraordinary. We spent three days "off the grid" testing this and everything was great. We ate everything from some si rival foods to fried spam and eggs. If your coffee drinker, take your press. I would say if you want to simplify things a little you should use pellets and fire starters. Although we only used it one day with the pellets, instead of the wood that we collected that was a remarkable difference
customer_reviews.author: cautious 1

customer_reviews.title: Inefficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a camping trip and it just did not work at all. The fire just did not sustain. You have to keep adding wood chips every couple of minutes. The ashes from the wood chips collect at the bottom quickly and oxygen supply chokes off causing the fire to go out. The fan shuts off randomly. If you want to boil a cup of water and use the stove sparingly, it may be okay but don’t depend on it to make a meal. After paying $200 for this bundle, I feel disgusted. I wish I could return it but since I have used it, I doubt they will take it back!
customer_reviews.author: Manoj Rana

customer_reviews.title: Great portable stove
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, the self contained recharging battery not only runs the fan but will recharge small devices. After being lit it is smokeless- dryer the fuel the better or the pellets they sell for longer burn on a single load- it is twig hungry. As a learning curve, lighting it every thing is straight forward- ashes left are powder. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: the only good use I got from it was it help me ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. You must fully charge the battery before use and then it doesn't hold a charge no matter how hot the fire is. I bought this when hurricane Irma came through, the only good use I got from it was it help me make a small pot of hot water for my instant coffee. It did not charge my cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS, NO SUPPORT, NO CUSTOMER SERVICE, $200 EVAPORATED!
customer_reviews.text: after 15 minutes of use, it totally died, it does not charge or turn on. All customer service contact data either does not exist or will not get back you. Both through Amazon nor through the Biolite website.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Castellino

customer_reviews.title: Great stove, but not quite ready to be your primary.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! When this thing goes, it creates a tornado of fire! Boiled 2 cups of water in 4 minutes. However, it DOES take a few minutes to really get going. Using Biolite pellets in addition to wood made a big difference in flame output. The stove is very well designed and built. I would not use it as a primary camp-stove however, as it is useless in the rain. It would be a good stove for an additional camper to take on a group trip, particularly for the charging feature.
customer_reviews.author: The Barman

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of needing to carry any fuel source ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I use mine for backpacking although it is on the heavy side. I like the idea of needing to carry any fuel source and also being bale to recharge a phone if necessary. Burns hot and boils a cup of water in under 5 min. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny_Rogue

customer_reviews.title: You need this product in your life if you have any desire to camp!
customer_reviews.text: This blows away any other product in the market. I highly recommend the French press they make for it too. Speed is whatever and I’m not usually in a hurry, and it’s replaced my solar charger, battery packs, instant coffee packets, and my jet boil so I do have more room to spare for other items. My only complaint is that the edges of the grill are all razor sharp. Not a big deal if you’re careful or dull them down with something.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money, too expensive,
customer_reviews.text: Does not charge a cell phone at all. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ruiz-Tulier

customer_reviews.title: Great readiness item,  Or for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Fast shipping and well packed. The product seems amazing on my test run. I filled it wit wood pellets and used one starter cube to light it. No problems. It burned super hot for about 45 mins on one fill. Fully brought the internal batter full in about half that time. Got a full pot of water to rolling boil in about 8 min. Didn’t test the grill yet though. But I’m confident it will work, for what it’s for. Can’t wate to use it for real.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept and design...
customer_reviews.text: Love the stove and the concept. I wish I'd have purchased the bundle though because of the grill. I didn't think the grill would be so pricey on its own. Maybe I'll be able to afford it someday...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far, appears sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. Will edit review once I have used it a couple of times. I would recommend that the plastic top for the grill part be looked at. The bottom hole cover and the larger grill cover itself are connected by a small piece of plastic. Where this plastic wraps around the grill, it was already showing stress degradation (as indicated by the fold pounds being lighter in color) upon taking it out. Perhaps a better solution would be for the bottom cap and upper cover to have heavy duty slots with a replaceable Velcro tie to hold the two together.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ(ret) Randall K. Faulkner, USA

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Took the stove on a reccent RV trip n out west and could not have been more disappointed. Read complete instructions and could not get it to work as described. Fan would not run consistently and only go t water to boil once but only under ideal conditions. I had read many glowing reviews but should have focused on the negative reviews. Had other campers at RV site try it also and we all got same results, a 1 out of 5 at best!!
customer_reviews.author: Highlander56

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Review 2... about 2 months later... camp stove is awesome, although I’m questioning the quality of a few items... namely the grill part. They’re holding up but sos pads and scrub brushes aren’t giving me a clean finis. The grill parts have rust on them, you have to clean the electrode and the pot (coffee pot) which I use for soup is burnt on the inside, not to mention the bottom...that said it works well: don’t use it for a power bank with no heat, but it can top off some devices that are already 80%
customer_reviews.author: Clayton L.

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn't keep coffee warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pot--but my partner melted the lid trying to keep the coffee warm. I'm pretty mad right now. Any chance you can save his bacon and let me know how I can purchase another lid?
customer_reviews.author: Kesti 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Takes time and DRY wood to get Power
customer_reviews.text: First off..... Dry wood only...you won't get a fire hot enough if you don't. Works wonderfully as a stove and a grill. Love the Kettle pot fits perfectly but spend the extra and get the Coffee press...it's makes a big difference. Does not charge as Fast as what I thought it would but on an overnight Float trip did keep Lights (LED) Android phone and GPS going when my Son's new Water Turbine (WLilly) could not be used due to the power cord being way to short to be used without submerging it. Powered his devices and my Youngest Sons as well..so I guess I was asking a lot out of it for it's First time out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping, emergency and picnics
customer_reviews.text: This little stove is quite versatile when it comes to burning all kinds of wooden fuel. Plus the battery units is a great addition to burning efficiency with its onboard fan. Plus it has the ability to store (2600 mAh battery) and produce electricity (just 3 watts). It's pretty heavy for backpacking but its worth carrying if you have electronics. Easy to clean and pack after use. On my first test burn, one cup of wood pellets gave me 30 minute of burn time with a medium fan. It could be a great addition to your gear.
customer_reviews.author: Josteper

customer_reviews.title: Great product but shipping is not discreet.
customer_reviews.text: I already know this is a brilliant product, but I wanted to add a note about shipping. It's shipped naked in the product box, which is covered in colorful pictures and descriptions. Sitting on your front porch won't just be a typical nondescript amazon box - it will be a very nice-looking, brand new, unopened product just sitting out there ready to steal. So, if you live in a theft-prone hood or you're buying this as a gift, try to make sure you're on-premises when it arrives. : )
customer_reviews.author: Allen Müller

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros - cute - light weight - compact - kettle pot design Cons - charge only worked with active fire, yellow battery barely held charge once fire was out - grill was incredibly hard to clean and did not heat well at all - hard to clean - sharp metal edges I would definitely not buy the set. The kettle is great and compact but for the price I would recommend a different system.
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional, Easy to Use, But Not As Light As Expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very Functional, Easy to Use, But Not As Light As Expected. When you pack it all up (battery inside stove, stove inside water heater) it becomes fairly heavy. That is fine for me as a car-camper, and short-distance hiker. I also bought it for my son - who does longer hikes where he carries everything. He uses it but has let me know that it is quite awkward to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. its not a great charger but in an emergency or when you don't have any other source of power its extremely nice to have. twigs don't really cut it though, bring or find thicker fire wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little stove
customer_reviews.text: Very small, but in a emergency it will be a life saver, cnd burn pine cones, any little wood pieces etc. and the best part is it will charge up you phone etc. The charger will also store energy so you'll hve it later with out starting a fire. I charged my pack when I first got it, but can't say how long it holds a charge, like most fairly good battery packs, will hold a charge for quite a long while.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but it's over priced. My issues were on the grill it's hard to clean and the ash build up is concerning.. I rather use my Solo Stove but this is a nice product for camping in the woods and need to cook something really quick..
customer_reviews.author: Jamar S.

customer_reviews.title: Leave footprints, burn some trash and take only pictures
customer_reviews.text: Just like Doctor Emmett Brown in Back to the Future, I in similar fashion have a kitchen stove/firepit and the only evidence that I was here is that some of the trash is missing. Absolutely thrilled to enjoy this space-age device. Trash provides heat then disappears into minute particles of soft ash. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: New Genre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little machine, creates a lot of heat and fully charges it’s own battery much faster than I expected, this is great for car camping and even backpacking if you like having you’re tech fully charged while out on the trail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The easiest grill/charger on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest grill/charger on the market! I have used this 6 times now and absolutely love it. The first time we tried it at the cabin we used sticks. Man we could not keep up with 5he gathering of sticks! Since then we have switched to wood pellets and that cut down on our hunt an gather skills for sticks. Charger charged up beautifully. I would recommend Biolite to all age groups.
customer_reviews.author: Becky B

customer_reviews.title: The biolite camp stove is awesome. It just works
customer_reviews.text: The biolite camp stove is awesome. It just works. I have used ours for all our camping trips as well as day trips for the past 2 years. It never fails and we cook just fine. I love being able to just use random biomass we find at location. It makes packing and fuel considerations super easy. I have purchased one of these for every member of my family. The price if fair and the quality of the item is fantastic. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Biolite camp stove
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled to get this as a Christmas gift. Still not a clue how it works, but how cool is it to make a fire, cook your dinner AND charge your phone all at the same time. Seems very well made, and love that it came with carrying bags to keep backpack clean while transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Killenberger

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Cannot keep a fire lit even in cloudy weather or if the wood is even slightly damp. Charging is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: バカ人

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my outdoor gear
customer_reviews.text: A bit skeptical at first I bought this never having seen it in the field. But very impressive. A dynamic piece of equipment. Much more than just a wood fired jet boil. Cooking, grilling, power and light. Even as a heat source. Very cool for car camping and packing in with animals. I don't know if I would back pack it in because of the weight, but it could be split up and shared. So far I have found the pellets to be the way to go. Burns hot and long. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this stove for my son in law who likes to be prepared for any emergency. He seemed to like it a lot. I thought it would be bigger than it was but then I suppose if it was, it wouldn't be as handy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schneider

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again. Can’t wait for the next generation
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient at creating a fire for food. The battery pack takes almost 2 hours to charge with a roaring flame and then won’t charge an idle phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May be heavy but it is worth it to have a battery and fire fan.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for hiking and backpacking. It was a bit heavier than I expected. But when I started to play with it, the weight was worth it. I started a fire with damp tinder and a homemade fire starter (PJ and cotton). It started immediately with the fan running and quickly turned into a raging fire. In a matter of 20 mins, the fire rated a 3-4 on the scale and I got the battery charged quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Messer73

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: The concept that the stove operates on is fantastic. It is a little picky on wood and it goes through what it holds in the burn chamber fairly quickly. I have used it winter camping with no noticeable negative difference in performance.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bleigh

customer_reviews.title: This product is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Went and did an overnight trip with my dog. Cooked a stew, steak and boiled water for coffee. 100% satisfied with this product, can’t wait to use it again. I highly recommend this product if you go camping, fishing, hunting or even hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The little thermal generator that could!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I LOVE IT! I HOPE THEY MAKE A BIGGER ONE OF THIS STYLE! Highly recommend this product and the company. Nothing better than sitting down to a little fire and charging your battery at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: MR.ICEBOX

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. The engineering and ingenuity behind this product is just outstanding. Everything it is designed to do it does exceptionally well. It has the ability to burn really hot and finding fuel is incredibly easy. Hands down the best camping stove on the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Creates more smoke compared to other stoves.
customer_reviews.text: It creates an insane amount of smoke when starting or shutting down. It gets hot and works, but be prepared to smoke out wherever you are.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Clark

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I used to boil water with a simple ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I used to boil water with a simple steel stove but with the fan the heat goes way up. It is also cool that it can charge stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Biolite experiences
customer_reviews.text: I used it camping I do overland, travel trailer and boat camping and it’s fine for those works great. Not sure I’d choose it for backpack camping or hiking were weight and size matter a lot. But over all really cool stove.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Havner

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchase, used it on a backpacking campout and by being able to burn small sticks and such, I didn't have to pack in extra fuel, also by being able to recharge phone, it added a safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate  J

customer_reviews.title: Great product great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It makes for quick meals while camping. Had a question about an adapter and Dale with their customer service answered me very quickly and hooked me up with the part. Outstanding customer service and a great camping accessory. If your into camping, get one of these stoves.
customer_reviews.author: Gene & Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this stove. The fan csuses everything to burn to ash. The battery and led light are perfect for low light. It burns hot and efficient and is designed to be portable. This company is awesome as well, very impressed by their mission to bring their products to third world countries to improve lives across the world.
customer_reviews.author: Ukizmyteam

customer_reviews.title: Another great Biolite Stove...
customer_reviews.text: This second generation Biolite is definitely improved and as reliable as we come to expect from the Biolite family of wood burning camping products.
customer_reviews.author: Cvbhardwaj

customer_reviews.title: Learn the burn before you run the trail
customer_reviews.text: wont Go camping without it, learn to use it before camping though can be kinda tricky
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This thing works well it can be hard to boil water on you have to have just the right wood to keep it going I actually started using match light charcoal
customer_reviews.author: Drag mav

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great boiled water fast and good quality materials. Goes through wood fast best to use hard wood and keep eye on it so you don't let fire burn out. Don't use pine wood leaves a sticky residue and smokes alot.
customer_reviews.author: joseph mitchell

customer_reviews.title: What people say is true, it's very awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The only problem I had/have is the customer support. I've called, left messages, emailed, and called and called. Never an answer, never a reply. I was not trying to contact through this amazon store, but to the co direct.
customer_reviews.author: Renea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and I’m excited to use it for the first time. I’m waiting for the 5 feet of snow to melt away first.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Small compact and has it bonuses. Easy to cook with fan and charger are nice. Burns wood really fast makes a ton of ash which clogs this little guy super quickly . Good for a quick meal and fast fire Terrible for use more then 30-45minutes. Uograding to a solo stove
customer_reviews.author: Kris Rewa

customer_reviews.title: Well done! Great product. Does exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Charges my cell phone will cooking. Easy to light and the fan keeps the fire going at the strength you need it to. Great jobs guys. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to field test this unit on a camping trip yet, but man, it worked pretty awesome in my back yard!
customer_reviews.author: David Broido

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent easy to use love it and will buy another when this quits working
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: he really liked it. I saw it work in a camping ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. Bought it as a Christmas gift for my father, he really liked it. I saw it work in a camping trip and if fully delivered. I am expecting the same once we put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Deceived!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo. I have used the BioLite for about a year now. When the lid finally broke I found out why. It has glue holding it together. So much for clean living!!! Love this product but I deal deceived. I hope they get back to me and fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, burn time is shorter than stated with pellets, but all in all works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: William Peterson

customer_reviews.title: If you camp or are in places where you may need a camp type stove, get this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised! This is the coolest thing since sliced bread. I will say the best way to do this is to start with a fire starter and some pellets. Get the fire hot then start feeding it debri
customer_reviews.author: Elton Hamar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to have when camping!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for anyone in your life who love to camp, but does not want to log a whole bunch of equipment with them. Not too heavy, and fits right inside the kettle pot (which clips nicely onto a backpack). I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ashlein redglo

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She loves it, so if she is happy, I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stove, and I can't wait to use it more. It is not a ultra lightweight stove, but that is not what I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic RainTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift and the recipient seems to be well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Parker

customer_reviews.title: BioLite
customer_reviews.text: Great. Cooked on it the first night. Takes a long time (couple of hours) for battery to get 100% charge.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, overheats every single use. Not reliable to be your only cooker. Also because of the open flames you don’t have a shut off for it’s not allowed in a lot of places.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Way cool little BBQ and Phone Charger
customer_reviews.text: Cooked some Kabobs and it worked terrific very easy to clean. Boils water in minutes .
customer_reviews.author: Tio

customer_reviews.title: Technology!! You can charge your phone or camera! So fast! Just burning wood.
customer_reviews.text: My friend got it from me as a BD gift, he was impressed;)
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: Worked just like advertised. I started the fire
customer_reviews.text: Worked just like advertised. I started the fire, the fan came on and no smoke. It powered the light.
customer_reviews.author: Mere Ursus Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Good for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Grill works great but you have to constantly feed the fire. Make sure you have lots of twigs before cooking. Charger is decent while fire burns.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Make electricity from burning wood
customer_reviews.text: This stove is amazing and all the guys at work want one now because it so awesome today was the 1st time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: william coplin

customer_reviews.title: Father’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my hubby for father’s day. He’s has used it already and is impressed. Will be taking it on a trip next weekend to get the full use out of it but so far impressed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool option to solar
customer_reviews.text: So far has operated as promised. Doing more testing but so far the heat exchanger appears to be recharging the battery. Very cool option to solar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome no more needing to carry fuel canisters or battery packs, I'm a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: damon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for car camping or base camp , short hikes. works perfect I have have loved all my Biolte products Brilliantly engineered and built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool product good to have weather a novice camper or big time adventurer!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! Took to my work Christmas party and was a big hit on the patio roasting marshmallows! Easy set up/pack up! Haven’t used the grill yet, but imagine it will work well from the looks of things.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great stove
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little stove it is so much fun to operate. With just a few twigs I was able to cook a piece of chicken like I cooked it on a stove. I was able to charge my phone a few percentages and it burned clean no smoke! The led light that came with it was clever use in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: The coolest campstove ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece of kit. So very light and incredibly easy to use. I highly recommend this product to anyone who regularly camps/hikes or goes fishing or hunting for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean reed

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good for cooking... takes a lot of material to charge phone
customer_reviews.author: keegan h.

customer_reviews.title: great not having to worry about packing in fuel
customer_reviews.text: Solar panels are far more convenient for charging purposes. The battery doesn't seem to hold much of a charge. Really handy grill, great not having to worry about packing in fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Blake T. Richards

customer_reviews.title: It works Great so far
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little heavy however it lightens my load by doing several things love it
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Gathers

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner!!! My husband said it was the best Birthday present EVER! 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Pete

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this sndcuses it whenever we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Camping necessity
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camping edition. Can't say enough awesome things about this stove. Saved my life stuck on a wet mountain in the cold and dark.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Great stove
customer_reviews.text: Stove is great. Easy set up and use, a little heavy for backpacking but you don’t have to carry fuel. The fact it generates electricity and can recharge device is an added plus
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: The cost is a little steep but it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love it Burns good cooks good charges excellent no complaints at all two thumbs up! If u go camping its a must need!!
customer_reviews.author: choncho

customer_reviews.title: It cooks hamburgers with little wood
customer_reviews.text: We did hamburgers for the first time tonight. I was impressed how it worked. It should be fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Going on motorcycle cross-country journeys, the need to have efficient, reliable and compact items is essential. This campstove hits all those marks. Amazing technology and works perfectly. Can't wait for the next iteration of this product - but this is now my go-to camping essential!

customer_reviews.text: My husband is pretty excited by this product! Well made

customer_reviews.text: Awesome, product, cannot wait to use it on a hike. Turned lots of heads when I opened the box and tested it while camping.

customer_reviews.title: Charges your phone while cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use easy to clean great for camping or tailgating.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Carrero

customer_reviews.title: Highly DISCOURAGE you buying this
customer_reviews.text: Fire wasn't even enough to recharge the fan battery, much less charge a light or device. The battery comes with a small charge for you to be able to start a fire immediately, but the battery died about 15 minutes into use. Unfortunately once the battery dies it's impossible to use the stove. Extremely disappointed. Will be returning immediately. I bought this stove for emergency situations and it has clearly failed. Thankfully I was just testing in my backyard and there wasn't any emergency at all.
customer_reviews.author: gongsun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchas
customer_reviews.text: Totally exceeded my expectations, brilliant concept and well designed final product.

customer_reviews.title: Light does not work
customer_reviews.text: My light does not work and no way to replace,, ;;does not burn long enough on one load

product_meta.title: BioLite Campstove 2 Wood Burning Electricity Generating & USB Charging Camp Stove
feature_bullets: USB charge output with 50% more power than our previous CampStove 1, with updated thermoelectrics creating even more electricity from fire, and Smart LED Dashboard gives you real time feedback on fire strength, power output and fan speed settings
Internal jets have 4 fan speed settings to circulate air for improved combustion and efficiency to boil 1 liter of water in 4.5 minutes
Lightweight aluminum legs fold up for nested portability and durability for camping, backpacking or power outages
The FlexLight is a portable, pliable USB gooseneck for quick, controlled light
